alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:10PM MST until March 09 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow showers. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, resulting in local blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
